root.description: Stars speckle the sky above the clearing.

exit.description: A [stream] babble quietly a short way off.
exit.onCheck: The [stream] has an easy current. It's shallow, but cold.

exit.description: A shabby [hut] crowns a hill overgrown with weeds.
exit.onCheck: Green and orange light shoots from the windows. A voice cackles within.

exit.description: The beginnings of a [trench] lead toward the back of the [hut].
exit.onCheck: The [trench] starts off shallow, but slopes downward sharply as it makes its way toward the hill.
